title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 November 2015 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius> has quit  
01:13 <sorinello\_\_> has quit  
01:14 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
01:31 <OSIMasson> has quit  
06:02 <Denis> has quit  
06:02 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
18:11 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
18:11 <vmassol1> hi xwikibot!  
18:12 <evalica> :)  
18:16 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
18:21 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
18:22 <ClemensR> vmassol1: about XWIKI-12804 : I guess no need to fix for 7.4, as space index is gone since 7.2, and its replacement is not affected  
18:23 <vmassol1> ah yes I missed that  
18:23 <ClemensR> I was just discussing things with people still on 6.4.5 when we figured it didnt work for them - maybe I will provide a fix even thought there might be no 6.4.7  
18:23 <vmassol1> is spaceindex really gone?  
18:23 <ClemensR> too bad we found it too late for 6.4.6 :(  
18:24 <vmassol1> I thought we still had it  
18:24 <ClemensR> no space, no more space index - only a "children view"  
18:24 <ClemensR> and the "children view" works without problems  
18:24 <vmassol1> I still see it  
18:24 <vmassol1> SpaceIndex.xml in index-ui  
18:24 <ClemensR> well, without that specific issue at least  
18:25 <ClemensR> it is introduced in XWIKI-12218  
18:25 <ClemensR> so that SpaceIndex page can be scrapped, probably  
18:25 <vmassol1> so we'll need to decide if we keep that page or not  
18:25 <vmassol1> yes  
18:25 <vmassol1> we need to decide that  
18:26 <vmassol1> we may want to move it as an extension on e.x.o  
18:26 <vmassol1> (or not)  
18:27 <ClemensR> even adding it as ?sheet=Main.SpaceIndex to the page brings up the space index in 7.3-rc-1, so bug vanished there too :)  
18:27 <ClemensR> seems I created a duplicate, forgot to check the closed issues ...  
18:35 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki
